parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To turn away, pervert, remove; I restore, replace; mid: I desert, reject. From apo and strepho; to turn away or back.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Hearing, faculty of hearing, ear; report, rumor. From akouo; hearing.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and the base of trope; to deflect, i.e. Turn away.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
An idle tale, fable, fanciful story. Perhaps from the same as mueo; a tale, i.e. Fiction.
